customConfig.name: frontPost
customConfig.label: Select post
customConfig.note: This option allows you to display the selected post on the front page. We strongly recommended 'hide' and 'noindex' the selected post to avoid the duplicate content issue.

customConfig.name: frontGallery
customConfig.note: Enable if you want to display a post with image gallery

customConfig.name: includeFeaturedInPosts
customConfig.label: Featured posts
customConfig.note: By default, the first wide article on the front page consists of a featured post. If there are multiple featured posts, they are excluded from the post listing to avoid duplication with the first wide post. To change this behavior, enable the relevant option.

customConfig.name: separator

authorConfig.note: Disabling the post list can cause duplicate content issues. To avoid this, please disable authors pagination in the SEO section of your site settings.
